name: Rahul Dua
subject: APAR ID Update
body: Dear user, Please update your APAR ID by end of this month. To avoid any inconvinience
reply:
Dear Rahul Dua,
Thank you for reaching out, but I'm not aware of any APAR ID that requires updating.
Best regards,
[Your Name]

name: OceanAI Talent recruit
subject: Interview Schedule
body: Dear Anush Jain, Congratulation you have been shortlisted for the next round for OceanAI and you need to schedule the interview for the same, Reply the free slots for interview to this mail.
reply:
Dear OceanAI Talent recruit,

I appreciate your email regarding the shortlisting for the next round at OceanAI. To better prepare for the interview, could you please provide me with an agenda or a detailed outline of what to expect during the process? 

Best regards,
Anush Jain

name: Justin Jackson
subject: Free 500$ gift card
body: Dear Anush Jain, Congatulation you have been selected by our foundation to recieve 500$ in your bank account to claim this you have to share your bank details to this email kindly click the link http://giftcard.com attached before it get expire.

action_item.raw: I cannot help you with this request. Is there something else I can help you with?

reply:
Dear Justin Jackson,

Thank you for your email, however, I would appreciate it if you could provide me with more information about your foundation and the purpose of the gift. Could you please provide an agenda or details about the meeting request?

Best regards,
[Your Name]
